summary: On the hunt for a fabled treasure of gold, a band of warriors, assassins, and a rogue British soldier descend upon a village in feudal China, where a humble blacksmith looks to defend himself and his fellow villagers.
cast: RZA|Rick Yune|Russell Crowe|Lucy Liu|Dave Bautista|Jamie Chung|Cung Le|Byron Mann|Daniel Wu|Zhu Zhu|Chia-Hui Liu|Andrew Ng|Kuan Tai Chen|Yoyao Hsueh|Telly Liu|Wen-Jun Dong|Dere Zhan|Lu Kai|Jin Au-Yeung|Ka-Yan Leung|ChangJiang Liu|Brian Yang|Hu Minnow|Masanobu Otsuka|Grace Huang|Andrew Lin|Luomin Ren|Eli Roth|Darren E. Scott|Hong Jia|Yindi Liu|Didi Qian|Lu Wei|Yuchen Du|Betty Zhou|Pam Grier|Jon T. Benn|Jake Garber|Beau van Erven Dorens|Dennis Chan|Osric Chau|Gang Zhou|Celina Jade|Isabella Qian|Shuliang Lian|Terence Yin|Mary Christina Brown
title: El hombre de los puños de hierro
